gtm: Modeling Group Testing Data

Version : 0.1.0; Copyright (C) 2024: License: GPL-2|GPL-3
Muhammad Yaseen1, Christopher McMahan1, Christopher Bilder2, and Joshua Tebbs3
  1. School of Mathematical & Statistical Sciences, Clemson University, Clemson, South Carolina, USA
  2. Department of Statistics, University of Nebraska-Lincoln, Nebraska, USA
  3. Department of Statistics, University of South Carolina, Columbia, South Carolina, USA

***

Description

Provides functions and methods for modeling and analyzing group testing data, enabling efficient statistical inference for pooled testing scenarios.

Installation

The package can be installed from CRAN as follows:

install.packages("gtm")

The development version can be installed from github as follows:

library(pak)
pkg_install("myaseen208/gtm")

What’s new

To know whats new in this version type:

news(package = "gtm")

Links

CRAN page

Github page

Documentation website

Citing gtm

To cite the methods in the package use:

citation("gtm")
To cite package 'gtm' in publications use:

  Yaseen M, McMahan C, Bilder C, Tebbs J (2025). _gtm: Modeling Group
  Testing Data_. R package version 0.1.0,
  <https://github.com/myaseen208/gtm>.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

  @Manual{,
    title = {gtm: Modeling Group Testing Data},
    author = {Muhammad Yaseen and Christopher McMahan and Christopher Bilder and Joshua Tebbs},
    year = {2025},
    note = {R package version 0.1.0},
    url = {https://github.com/myaseen208/gtm},
  }
